title: UNBOX : เปิดกล่องอาร์ตทอยไทย
description: UNBOX : Unboxing Thai art toysMarch 11 - May 25, 2025Time: 10:30 a.m. - 7:00 p.m. (Closed on Mondays)At TCDC Bangkok Creative SpaceThe exhibition "UNBOX: Opening the Box of Thai Art Toys" Creative & Design Showcase, an activity to promote businesses in the creative industry under the theme "UNBOX: Opening the Box of Thai Art Toys", showcases more than 30 art toys designed and created by Thai artists and designers. The aim is to reflect the concepts, creative processes and development of unique characters (Character Design), as well as connections to cultural contexts and local assets through the interpretation and transmission of stories that can be further developed into commercial production.Date and time: 11 March - 25 May 2025, 10:30 AM - 7:00 PM (Closed on Mondays)Location: TCDC Bangkok Creative Space, 5th floor and Front Lobby, 1st floorSuitable for students of all ages.
ticket: ไม่มีค่าเข้าชม
